rounds.comments: (Alex: All the correct responses in that category will end in "-ology".)

clues.text: Of myology, urology, & ourology, the fake

rounds.text: Her marriage to a European crown prince in the 16th century added Queen of Naples & Queen of Jerusalem to her titles
